sentences.sentence: The story appears in different guises in different cultures.
sentences.translation: 这个故事以不同的形式出现在不同的文化中。

sentences.sentence: Cynicism, in all its guises, really may make us see the world more realistically—though at a high personal cost.
sentences.translation: 尽管要付出高昂的个人代价，但不管是什么样的伪装，愤世嫉俗都确实可以让我们看到更真实的世界。

sentences.sentence: Diploma or degree mills come in many guises.
sentences.translation: 文凭或学位作坊总是以多种伪装的形式出现。
